title: Orders with Total Value
description: Write a query to display each order with its total value. Show order_id, order_date, and total_value.
hint: Join orders with order_items and products, then GROUP BY order_id and use SUM().
solution: SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, SUM(products.price * order_items.quantity) as total_value FROM orders INNER JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id INNER JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY orders.order_id, orders.order_date
